akas from release info: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (original title)
As Novas Aventuras dos Ursinhos Carinhosos Brazil
As Novas Aventuras dos Ursinhos Carinhosos: Aventuras na Terra-do-Carinho Brazil
Los Osos Amorosos: Bienvenidos a Mucho Mimo Spain

1.title: True Heart's Big Trip/Bumbleberry Jammed

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

1.plot: When True Heart trips in a big way, the other Care Bears (realizing she's ok) tease her about her super-stumble-bumble-mega-fall. Oopsy (the walking accident waiting to happen) helps her to put it all into perspective.

2.title: Desperately Seeking Mr. Beaks/Good Knight Bedtime

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

2.plot: Grizzle accuses the Care Bears of stealing Mr. Beaks, and the bears offer to help despite his false claim. But some of the bears are having more fun playing detective than really trying to help. Will the bears guide Grizzle to his best friend?

3.title: Bumpity and Tweazle/Here Comes McKenna

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

3.plot: Bumpity and Tweazle (two clouds) are lost from their cloud school and are having trouble navigating through Care-a-Lot. The Care Bears teach them to turn the unknown into something fun, and later return the favor.

4.title: Surprise Day/Tempus Fugit

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

4.plot: Harmony Bear doesn't like surprises, so she's making sure that she stays in her house on Surprise Day. Share shows her that conquering your fears is the best surprise of all!

5.title: Whose Friend Is Who?/Present and Accounted For

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

5.plot: When the girls decide to teach their new friend McKenna about working together, some of the other bears feel left out. Will new and old friends come together and learn that it's more fun to include others than to leave them out?

6.title: Harmony Unplugged/King of the Gobblebugs

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

6.plot: When Love-a-Lot suggests that Harmony perform a concert for Care-a-lot, Harmony's inner diva comes out. Will she get her ego under control, or drive away all her friends before the big show?

7.title: Night Shift/No Snow Day

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

7.plot: It's time for Bedtime Bear to give his friends an inside look into his nightly duties! With a tricky pudding pile threatening Care-a-lot, will some of the other Care Bears be able to "walk a mile in his ooze"?

8.title: Belly Blanked/All Give and No Take

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

8.plot: Funshine's feeling lost after losing his belly badge until Grizzle comes to destroy Care-a-Lot-- with Funshine's badge glued to his tummy! Using his smarts, Funshine proves that it's not the badge that makes the bear.

9.title: Luck 'O Oopsy/Rudemate

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

9.plot: Oopsy wants to participate in the Care-a-lot Grand Prix, but he seems to be plagued with bad luck. Will a chat with Good Luck Bear and a four-leaf clover help him see where real luck comes from?

10.title: Tour de Farce/Bad News

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

10.plot: McKenna has invited everyone on a special bike ride to Rainshine Meadows for a picnic, but Grumpy doesn't know how to ride a bike, so his friends help him learn that practice makes perfect.

11.title: Forget It/Gone

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

11.plot: Tenderheart and Funshine are mad at each other, but that soon changes when Grizzle strikes with a Forget-Me-Ray! To save Care-a-lot, the bears quickly need to find a way to forgive and "forget it".

12.title: Broken: Part One/Broken: Part Two

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

12.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

13.title: Emma's Dilemma: Part One/Emma's Dilemma: Part Two

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: A Little Help/Tell Tale Tummy

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

1.plot: The Tell-Tale Tummy: Share breaks Grumpy's Cloud Express invention and tries to hide that she did it. Feeling the guilt, Shares learns about her conscience as it tries to tell her something through her tummy. A Little Help: Grumpy has too much to handle in preparation for the Rainbow Night celebration, but he won't ask for help.

2.title: Growing Pains/King Grumpy

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

2.plot: Growing Pains: Cheer and Share are battling a brand new monster- the green-eyed monster called jealousy! The giant Grow-Glitter mess they make of their gardens is a BIG problem! King Grumpy: When Grumpy hurts his foot in a Bubble-phonium accident, he takes a little bit too much advantage of Wingnut's friendly willingness to help out.

3.title: Ice Creamed/Heatwave

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

3.plot: Ice Creamed : Grumpy rebuilds Amigo Bear's ice cream cart so it provides an endless supply of ice cream. What could go wrong with a never-ending quantity of sweet goodness? Heatwave: Grizzle is at it again, using a giant "Magnifrier" to heat up Care-a-lot! Will Share get over her fear of the Thunderwhales and get them to save Care-a-lot with some cooling rain?

4.title: Erased/Unbearable

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

4.plot: Erased: Grizzle's eraser ray doesn't quite work, but it did turn the Care Bears' badges upside down and changed the way they act! Unbearable: The Care Bears give Funshine a trophy to say "thank you" for his helpfulness, but it ends up going to his head and getting he and his friends trapped in Grizzle's lair!

5.title: Care-Ful Bear/A Case of the Grumpies

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

5.plot: Care-ful Bear: Funshine feels responsible for Share getting hurt during a game, so he dons a cape to become Care-ful Bear, the champion of safety. Can the Care Bears get Funshine to take off the cape and just play with them again? A Case of the Grumpies: Grumpy is storming around Care-a-lot and seems grumpier than usual, so Cheer decides to "un-grump the "Grumpster".

6.title: Cheer, There and Everywhere/Twinklet

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

6.plot: Cheer, There and Everywhere : Cheer gets to make the special Starshine star for the Starshine Parade, but she lets her friends down by getting caught up in directing and helping everyone else and forgetting something very important that she is supposed to do. Twinklet: When a Twinklet, a baby star, gets lost in Care-a-lot, Oopsy decides to adopt her.

7.title: Belly Ball/Bubbles

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

7.plot: Belly Ball: Share thinks that winning a ribbon in a Belly Ball Game will make her friends like her more, so she practices so much that she neglects the very friends she's actually trying to impress. The Bubbles: Funshine is sick with "The Bubbles" an illness that makes Care Bears start to float away. But he won't take care of himself, so now he's hiccupping bubbles and has to stay in bed.

8.title: Rainshine Meadows/Oopsy the Hero

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

8.plot: Rainshine Meadows: Funshine wants to clean up Rainshine Meadows, which is an environmental disaster, and help its inhabitants. Will the actions of one bear make a difference? Oopsy, the Hero: Oopsy saves Harmony and Cheer from a falling object- by accident! When Care-a-lot dubs him a hero, he doesn't want to tell them it was all a fluke, but real heroes have to face the truth.

9.title: All You Need Is.../Gobblebugs

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

9.plot: All You Need Is: Oopsy wants his friends to like him, not just accept him, so he puts on some love perfume to win them over- but it's not the magic aroma that draws them to him in the end! Gobblebugs: The Gobblebugs are on their way to destroy Care-a-lot but Cheer would rather be testing her brand new Jump Points invention than standing guard against the bugs.

10.title: Grizzle-ized/Share and Share Alike

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

10.plot: Grizzle-ized: Oopsy is feeling un-special and gets tricked by Grizzle to help him deliver a "gift" for the Care Bears. But is Grizzle's plan Oopsy-proof? Share and Share Alike: Share's been waiting a whole year to make her famous rootbear floats (they make bears float!), but Harmony invites some extra bears without asking first, leaving Share without any rootbear for herself!

11.title: Dare Bears/Battle of the Bands

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

11.plot: Dare Bears : Funshine and Tenderheart are in a daring mood, each one trying to one-up the other with a bigger dare. Things get out of hand in Grumpy's garage, showing that the bears should stick to caring rather than daring. Battle of the Band: Share, Harmony, Love-a-lot, Cheer and True Heart have formed a band: the Care Bear Honeys, because they are sweet and stick together!

12.title: Rebooted/Flower Power

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

12.plot: Re-Booted :Grizzle has gotten kicked out of his own lair by his new robot! Stuck in Care-a-lot, the bears welcome him with open arms- will he still try to destroy them even after he learns to care? Flower Power: Share's garden is blooming beautifully with Dilly Daisies. They become a Care-a-lot fashion fad and all the bears learn that it isn't what you wear, but who you are that counts!

13.title: Two of a Kind/Stand Up and Cheer

episode of.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot (TV Series 2007–2008)

13.plot: Two of a Kind: The Care Bears are trying to help Grumpy, but he's getting very flustered and super bossy because they aren't doing things the "Grumpy way". Stand Up and Cheer: Care-a-lot is having a Talent Contest! Cheer has gotten so distracted helping everyone else that she's not had time to find a talent of her own.

imdb.plot outline: This series features the new redesigned Care Bears with redesigned tummy symbols (now called "belly badges"). It also features a redesigned Care-a-lot. Additionally, there was initially no interaction with humans or other supernatural entities like those found in the previous iteration. Instead, as an immediate follow-up to Care Bears: Oopsy Does It!, the series inherits the sole villain from the movie, Grizzle, who has robots to do his bidding.
imdb.title: Care Bears: Adventures in Care-A-Lot
plot: This series features the new redesigned Care Bears with redesigned tummy symbols (now called "belly badges"). It also features a redesigned Care-a-lot. Additionally, there was initially no interaction with humans or other supernatural entities like those found in the previous iteration. Instead, as an immediate follow-up to Care Bears: Oopsy Does It!, the series inherits the sole villain from the movie, Grizzle, who has robots to do his bidding.
